description: The file 'main.dart' initializes a Flutter application for a note organizer app. It sets up environment variables, initializes Supabase, and defines main UI components including the main app widget, data model, state management provider, various screens (list, detail, edit), and search functionality.

classes.name: NotesApp
classes.description: Main widget initializing the app with theme and provider configurations.

classes.name: Note
classes.description: Data model representing a note with serialization and deserialization from Map.

classes.name: NotesProvider
classes.description: State management class handling notes, folders, tags, and integration with Supabase.

classes.name: NotesHomeScreen
classes.description: Screen displaying list of notes with navigation to detail and creation screens.

classes.name: FolderDrawer
classes.description: UI component for navigating notes by folders and tags.

classes.name: NoteDetailScreen
classes.description: Screen for viewing, editing, and deleting individual notes.

classes.name: NoteEditorScreen
classes.description: Form for creating or editing notes with validation.

classes.name: NotesSearchDelegate
classes.description: Search delegate enabling searching within notes.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point for the Flutter app, sets up environment, initializes Supabase, and runs the app.
